title: Home at seven
creator_credit: Eric Muller, Paul Gray, Vauxhall Motors Film Unit and British Information Services
brief_description: The reliability of the modern British motor-car owes much to the skill of the designers and engineers associated with the development of a new model. Describes the design, manufacture, and testing of Vauxhall cars, with emphasis on reliable performance under hard, daily motoring conditions. Skills involved in preparing for a mass production run are also illustrated.
